title: Best Memorial Day Furniture Sales: 31 AD-Approved Deals (2025)
description: A curated list with extended deals to help you cut down on purchase procrastination
author: Audrey Lee
excerpt: Our roundup of the best Memorial Day furniture sales and decor deals on the internet for lighting, furniture, rugs and home decor—whether you’re looking to invest or just need a little something.
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.The best Memorial Day furniture sales of 2025 are still going, with some deals clocking out as late as June (like the rest of us, setting our OOO calendars for summer Fridays). Meaning this is an excellent time to score deep discounts on investment pieces like a stylish new sectional, some new outdoor furniture, or something nice for your drab home office.Not sure where to start? We got a head start on the scrolling and clicking to find you some of the best Memorial Day furniture sales that are actually worth the screen time, from some of our favorite retailers like Castlery, Article, and beyond. Keep an eye on this page, as we’ll continue feeding you more of the best furniture deals to browse in between mouthfuls of potato salad.Our Top Picks for the Best Memorial Day Sale Furniture Deals:Best Rug: AllModern Racheal Light Green Rug, $165 $115Best Sofa Set: Castlery Jonathan Leather Extended Sofa with Ottoman, $4,646 $4,409Best Outdoor Chair: Serena & Lily Pacifica Swivel Chair, $2,398 $1,998Best Mattress: Casper Dream Max Hybrid, $3,195 $2,235Crate & BarrelCrate & Barrel’s outdoor furniture sale is so good we had to shout it out twice—right now you can score for up to 70% off on clearance items to outfit your space (note that some are Final Sale), and up to 30% off regular-priced outdoor items. The deals include nature-inspired seating like outdoor teak sectionals that stand out from the crowd. Plus, picks with functionality like a kitchen island that can double as an outdoor bar and sage-hued aluminum dining chairs. What’s more, you can double your rewards with outdoor furniture purchases.Crate & Barrell Batten Teak L-Shaped Outdoor Sectional SofaCrate & Barrel Bari Green Metal Stackable Outdoor Dining Chair with CushionArhausIf you’re in the mood to makeover a neglected area of your home, the Arhaus Memorial Day sale is one to keep a close eye on. The brand is offering 30% off in-stock favorites to celebrate the holiday, though we found a few deals with discounts that do you one better. Take this Canyon sofa with enough main character potential to make the Joneses next door green with envy: [whispers] It’s a whopping 50% off right now.Arhaus Canyon Outdoor Teak Sofa in Natural TeakArhaus Sequoia PlanterSerena & LilyThere is no better way to get summer started than by decorating your home to look like a dreamy Cape Cod cottage. Serena & Lily can help you a bit in that department with their ongoing Outdoor Event, offering up to 30% off furniture and decor for alfresco festivities.Serena & Lily Pacifica Outdoor PendantSerena & Lily Pacifica Swivel ChairBranchThere are a few pieces of furniture you shouldn’t skimp on and one is definitely an office chair. You likely spend a lot of time in this seat, especially if you work from home, so it’s important to invest in a quality option. Right now, you'll score pieces from the brand at up to 15% off using the code MEMORIALDAY. We’ve tested a few office chairs and one of our favorites is the Branch Ergonomic chair. Writer Terri Williams found the seat’s synchronous tilt and adjustable lumbar support made her sigh “ahhh” every time she sat down.Branch Ergonomic ChairBranch Desk RiserWayfairWayfair is great for those “I need a piece of furniture, quick!” moments. It’s also great for holiday sales. Right now, the major retailer’s offering up to 60% off during their pre–Memorial Day sale on bedroom furniture (including this area rug and sleeper sofa that the AD team has personally tested). Be sure to take advantage of these major markdowns on investment pieces like a bed frame, dresser, area rug, and more.AllModern Racheal Light Green RugWade Logan Kodie Upholstered Sleeper SofaPottery BarnThere's a sale on top of sale going on at Pottery Barn, one of our go-tos for investment-worthy pieces for any area of the home. For Memorial Day, the brand is offering up to 60% off with an extra 20% off already on-sale items, meaning it's worth sifting through the clearance section for hidden gems—like this outdoor sconce that has a rustic feel.Pottery Barn Abbott Acacia Woven Outdoor Lounge ChairPottery Barn Pearce Glass Outdoor SconceCastleryIf you’re looking to deck out your dining room, home office, living room, or any other space in your house with new pieces, head straight to Castlery’s early access Memorial Day sale. Commerce director Rachel Fletcher especially loved reclining on the Jonathan chaise sectional sofa, and you can get a Jonathan leather sofa that comes with an ottoman at a little over $200 off.Castlery Jonathan Leather Extended Sofa with OttomanCastlery Karo Tripod Floor LampBrooklinenBrooklinen’s another AD favorite that’s not going gently into the long weekend. At their long weekend bash (ahem, 25% off Memorial Day Sale), we’d recommend starting with a sheet bundle that’s backed by 90,000 five-star reviews.Brooklinen Classic Core Sheet SetBrooklinen Airweave Cotton QuiltLulu and GeorgiaOne of our favorite furniture retailers (and a hotspot for designer collaborations) announced 20% sitewide to celebrate Memorial Day with deeper discounts to be found in its official clearance section. You can snag delicious deals across all categories, including, bedroom pieces, outdoor furniture, and decor for any area of your home. We think it’s a particularly excellent opportunity to add this modern Sarah Sherman Samuel-designed mirror to your entryway or build a whole new living room around the Carson sofa. The sale ends tomorrow so don’t delay.Ripple Round Mirror by Sarah Sherman SamuelLulu and Georgia Carson SofaInterior DefineOur contributor Rachel Kalichman called Interior Define’s Gaby sectional “an elegant and neutral piece that can fit any type of decor style.” Head to their site now for 20% off on orders $2,999 and below, and get 25% off orders $3,000 and over.Interior Define Gaby Leather Chaise SectionalInterior Define Glenn Floor LampCozy EarthBedding and loungewear: They are the finishing touch for any carefully curated room. Now’s your chance to try the bedding brand that both Oprah and commerce editor Audrey Lee gave their stamp of approval to. Save up to 25% during the brand’s Memorial Day sale. We recommend stocking up on the cool-to-the-touch bamboo sheet sets.Cozy Earth Coronado Lounge ChairCozy Earth Linen Bamboo Sheet SetSSENSESSENSE doesn’t carry your average home essentials. The pieces from this retailer are far more luxe and unlike anything you’ll find anywhere else—like this mug that looks more like a modern art piece. For the holiday weekend, the site is offering up to 50% off sale items. This is a much-anticipated seasonal sale, so don’t sleep on it.Maki Rugs Entirety RugHenry Holland Studio Check Loop MugSaatchi ArtFinding ways to fill up wall space can be surprisingly difficult—and it’s easy to opt for something you less than love, like an ubiquitous Matisse print. Saatchi Art makes finding work you connect with a bit easier, thanks to a massive curated selection. Head to Saatchi for 15% off all original art OVER $500 with code SUNBEAM15, and 20% off original art over $3,000 with code SUNBEAM20 through 5/29."Interior with Red Chair" by Patty Rodgers"Jungle Part" by Szabo EszterSaatvaIf you’re already purchasing some new sheets, then you might as well snag a new mattress to put your sheets on. Luckily Saatva, one of our favorite mattresses, is hosting a limited-time sale ahead of Memorial Day. We’d recommend taking advantage of the pre–Memorial Day deals to get the brand’s Loom & Leaf memory foam mattress, which contributor Bailey Berg called the “most breathable, comfortable mattress” she’s ever tried. And be sure to check out our roundup of the best Memorial Day mattress sales happening right now!Saatva Loom & Leaf MattressSaatva Santorini Bed FrameThe Company StoreThere are a lot of things you could stock up on during The Company Store’s summer sale, but we recommend looking into the indoor/outdoor pillow situation. Regardless, you can get 30% off sitewide across all categories—no code needed.Sunbrella Indoor/Outdoor Toss PillowJersey Knit Comforter SetBuffyWe’ve reviewed (and loved) many products from Buffy—the Breeze sheet set, the linen sheet set, the Cloud pillow, Breeze comforter, linen quilt, and so much more. Lucky for all of us, the brand’s offering 20% off sitewide during their early Memorial Day sale promo.Buffy Eucalyptus Sheet SetBuffy Cloud ComforterAlbany ParkAnyone looking to end their years-long search for a couch should take a peek at what AD-reviewed brand Albany Park is offering: up to 45% off select seating. In a world where buying a couch can be wildly overwhelming, the brand makes it easy with a few versatile choices. Our contributor Terri Williams knows that better than anyone—she told us her Park sectional has “clean lines, sleek edges, and soft covers [that] would look good in almost any type of home.”Albany Park Park Sectional SofaAlbany Park Barton SofaDWRDesign Within Reach aims to make luxurious designer furniture pieces from past and present just a little more accessible for online shoppers. In stock items are 30% off, like this curvaceous chair from Sarah Ellison and a Knoll cart we recently included in our roundup of the best outdoor bar carts. And you’ll save even more this Memorial Day thanks to an additional 20% off already-on-sale items with code EXTRA20.Sarah Ellison Chromeo ChairKnoll 1966 Porcelain Serving Cart by Richard SchultzWest ElmA go-to retailer for elevated furniture-and-decor basics, West Elm is having a massive Fourth of July Warehouse Sale. Take up to 60% off furniture and decor, including lovely outdoor couches marked down right as outdoor hosting season is ramping up and these discounted throw pillows that will really dress up your indoor seating or currently drab bedscape.West Elm Portside Outdoor SofaWest Elm Mariposa Pillow CoverSundaysSundays sells furniture pieces big and small for all areas of your home, and the brand is currently running up to 30% off everything. Contributor Shoko Wagner personally experienced one of the retailer’s best sellers when she reviewed the Wind Down sectional. “Designed with clean lines, deep cushions, and just-right balance of softness and structure, it never appears slouchy or sloppy (even with a three-year-old who has taken to practicing high dives and somersaults on it),” she says.Sundays Wind Down 3-Piece Modular SectionalSundays Cloud Bed with StorageParachuteFor Memorial Day weekend, Parachute’s promotions include 30% off everything and up to 75% off its sale items—meaning you could spend all summer wrapped up in gloriously soft bedding and loungewear. Plus, the sale’s also an excellent time to get ahead of schedule with your Father’s Day gifting strategy.Parachute Waffle RobeParachute Linen Bedding BundleRejuvenationCheck out Rejuvenation for discounts on classic, American-leaning outdoor furniture designs. During the brand's Memorial Day promotions you can save up to 60% off and enjoy free shipping with code FREESHIP. We recommend using the opportunity to focus on versatile furniture that can fit any room. After all, this comfy-looking lounge chair looks like the perfect piece to finally fill the empty space in your home office or replace the uncomfortable love seat in your living room.Rejuvenation Parkrose ChairRejuvenation Rullis BenchNordstromHere’s an insider tip: Some of our favorite home brands happen to be stocked at Nordstrom. Think: Riedel wine glasses, cookware from Le Creuset, designer candles, Parachute bedding, Casper pillows, and so much more. This means, that during the brand’s big Half Yearly Sale you can grab rare deals on items that don’t usually get discounted—like this XL Le Creuset dutch oven. Though, we also think this fashionable wool and cashmere blanket is a steal at more than 60% off.Nordstrom Plaid Wool & Cashmere Throw BlanketLe Creuset Signature Oval Enamel Cast Iron French/Dutch OvenZinusZinus, who makes some of our favorite bed frames, is offering up discounts ahead of Memorial Day too. We’d use this as an opportunity to snag the Original Green Tea mattress, which is currently 20% off.Zinus Cooling Green Tea Gel Memory Foam MattressZinus Luca Reversible Chaise Sectional SofaCasperOur team has tried (and loved) a lot of Casper mattresses. In fact, we dedicated a whole story just to some of our favorites. One was the Nova mattress, which contributor Nora Taylor found offered the ideal balance of plushness and support. Though Casper doesn’t sell the Nova anymore, you can get the very similar Dream Max Hybrid mattress for 30% off as part of the brand’s Memorial Day deals.Casper Dream Max Hybrid MattressCasper Haven Bed FrameJoyBirdJoybird has also extended its Memorial Day sale through June 2. This week, shoppers can still enjoy 35% off sitewide, best-selling items at up to 45% off, and select bundles up to 50% off. We have our sights set on items that will give your living room a face lift. The brand’s best-selling Lewis sofa or the Amelia Grand chair in an eye-catching teal or burnt orange will do just that.Joybird Lewis SofaJoybird Amelia Grand ChairMcgee & Co.Hurry! McGee & Co.’s sale ends tonight, May 27, and we think it’s the perfect opportunity to refresh your bedroom’s decor and furniture. Customers can enjoy up to 30% off sitewide as well as an additional 30% off already on sale items—meaning it’s worth looking through the clearance section for optimal deals. The brand’s floral block quilt is the perfect bedding to replace your winter-weight comforter ahead of summer. And if you’re looking to build out a more dynamic bedroom furniture layout, the Mansfield bench is just the piece to bring both function and style to the foot of your bed.McGee & Co. Floral Block Print QuiltMcGee & Co. Mansfield BenchSoho HomeHere’s something special: Soho Home is offering rare, 30% off discounts on select furniture and decor, meaning if you’ve had something from the brand on your wishlist, this might be your chance to snag a bargain. We’re particularly drawn to seats and lighting from the brand, so naturally we’d start there. The brand’s Abel armchair is the perfect place to spend all future lazy days, and the Casper table lamp is the ideal entryway piece to greet friends and visitors.Soho Home Abel ArmchairSoho Home Casper Table LampSixpennyRight now you can save 20% off Sixpenny purchase of $1,000 and up with code DANCINGLIGHT. After all, we know you’ve had your eye on some seating from Sixpenny ever since senior digital design editor Zoë Sessums called their Neva sectional, “One of the most comfy couches I’ve spent time on in a while.”Sixpenny Gabriel SofaSixpenny Gio ChairAmazonAmazon’s furniture and decor collections cover just about all the bases—from sectional sofas to statement lighting, rugs of all shapes and sizes, and modern bedframes to finally replace the one you’ve been using since college. The Naturalista frame from Mellow is an upgrade that will go with just about anything, you can even dress it up with a headboard of your choosing. For something with a slightly coastal touch, we like this rattan dresser that will finally motivate you to fold your clothes instead of tossing everything onto that one chair.FUQARHY Rattan DresserMellow Naturalista Classic Platform BedLunyaIf some fresh silk Pjs ahead of summer sound like a smart idea you’ll want to check out Lunya’s ongoing sale, which includes 70% off select items. “Even after washing [my] set many times over the years (cold water and mild detergent only!), they’ve held up wonderfully,” says commerce editor Audrey Lee. For the gals, we’d grab this printed set from the Grace Dines collab while you still can, while we think any guy would love the brand’s Slumberknit sweat pants (since we know you’re in desperate need of a new pair after a long winter.)Lunya x Grace Dines Washable Silk Tee Pant SetLunya Slumberknit Pant
html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.

The best Memorial Day furniture sales of 2025 are still going, with some deals clocking out as late as June (like the rest of us, setting our OOO calendars for summer Fridays). Meaning this is an excellent time to score deep discounts on investment pieces like a stylish new sectional, some new outdoor furniture, or something nice for your drab home office.

Not sure where to start? We got a head start on the scrolling and clicking to find you some of the best Memorial Day furniture sales that are actually worth the screen time, from some of our favorite retailers like Castlery, Article, and beyond. Keep an eye on this page, as we’ll continue feeding you more of the best furniture deals to browse in between mouthfuls of potato salad.

Our Top Picks for the Best Memorial Day Sale Furniture Deals:

  • Best Rug: AllModern Racheal Light Green Rug, $165 $115
  • Best Sofa Set: Castlery Jonathan Leather Extended Sofa with Ottoman, $4,646 $4,409
  • Best Outdoor Chair: Serena & Lily Pacifica Swivel Chair, $2,398 $1,998
  • Best Mattress: Casper Dream Max Hybrid, $3,195 $2,235

Crate & Barrel

Crate & Barrel’s outdoor furniture sale is so good we had to shout it out twice—right now you can score for up to 70% off on clearance items to outfit your space (note that some are Final Sale), and up to 30% off regular-priced outdoor items. The deals include nature-inspired seating like outdoor teak sectionals that stand out from the crowd. Plus, picks with functionality like a kitchen island that can double as an outdoor bar and sage-hued aluminum dining chairs. What’s more, you can double your rewards with outdoor furniture purchases.

Crate & Barrell Batten Teak L-Shaped Outdoor Sectional Sofa

Crate & Barrel Bari Green Metal Stackable Outdoor Dining Chair with Cushion

Arhaus

If you’re in the mood to makeover a neglected area of your home, the Arhaus Memorial Day sale is one to keep a close eye on. The brand is offering 30% off in-stock favorites to celebrate the holiday, though we found a few deals with discounts that do you one better. Take this Canyon sofa with enough main character potential to make the Joneses next door green with envy: [whispers] It’s a whopping 50% off right now.

Arhaus Canyon Outdoor Teak Sofa in Natural Teak

Arhaus Sequoia Planter

Serena & Lily

There is no better way to get summer started than by decorating your home to look like a dreamy Cape Cod cottage. Serena & Lily can help you a bit in that department with their ongoing Outdoor Event, offering up to 30% off furniture and decor for alfresco festivities.

Serena & Lily Pacifica Outdoor Pendant

Serena & Lily Pacifica Swivel Chair

Branch

There are a few pieces of furniture you shouldn’t skimp on and one is definitely an office chair. You likely spend a lot of time in this seat, especially if you work from home, so it’s important to invest in a quality option. Right now, you'll score pieces from the brand at up to 15% off using the code MEMORIALDAY. We’ve tested a few office chairs and one of our favorites is the Branch Ergonomic chair. Writer Terri Williams found the seat’s synchronous tilt and adjustable lumbar support made her sigh “ahhh” every time she sat down.

Branch Ergonomic Chair

Branch Desk Riser

Wayfair

Wayfair is great for those “I need a piece of furniture, quick!” moments. It’s also great for holiday sales. Right now, the major retailer’s offering up to 60% off during their pre–Memorial Day sale on bedroom furniture (including this area rug and sleeper sofa that the AD team has personally tested). Be sure to take advantage of these major markdowns on investment pieces like a bed frame, dresser, area rug, and more.

AllModern Racheal Light Green Rug

Wade Logan Kodie Upholstered Sleeper Sofa

Pottery Barn

There's a sale on top of sale going on at Pottery Barn, one of our go-tos for investment-worthy pieces for any area of the home. For Memorial Day, the brand is offering up to 60% off with an extra 20% off already on-sale items, meaning it's worth sifting through the clearance section for hidden gems—like this outdoor sconce that has a rustic feel.

Pottery Barn Abbott Acacia Woven Outdoor Lounge Chair

Pottery Barn Pearce Glass Outdoor Sconce

Castlery

If you’re looking to deck out your dining room, home office, living room, or any other space in your house with new pieces, head straight to Castlery’s early access Memorial Day sale. Commerce director Rachel Fletcher especially loved reclining on the Jonathan chaise sectional sofa, and you can get a Jonathan leather sofa that comes with an ottoman at a little over $200 off.

Castlery Jonathan Leather Extended Sofa with Ottoman

Castlery Karo Tripod Floor Lamp

Brooklinen

Brooklinen’s another AD favorite that’s not going gently into the long weekend. At their long weekend bash (ahem, 25% off Memorial Day Sale), we’d recommend starting with a sheet bundle that’s backed by 90,000 five-star reviews.

Brooklinen Classic Core Sheet Set

Brooklinen Airweave Cotton Quilt

Lulu and Georgia

One of our favorite furniture retailers (and a hotspot for designer collaborations) announced 20% sitewide to celebrate Memorial Day with deeper discounts to be found in its official clearance section. You can snag delicious deals across all categories, including, bedroom pieces, outdoor furniture, and decor for any area of your home. We think it’s a particularly excellent opportunity to add this modern Sarah Sherman Samuel-designed mirror to your entryway or build a whole new living room around the Carson sofa. The sale ends tomorrow so don’t delay.

Ripple Round Mirror by Sarah Sherman Samuel

Lulu and Georgia Carson Sofa

Interior Define

Our contributor Rachel Kalichman called Interior Define’s Gaby sectional “an elegant and neutral piece that can fit any type of decor style.” Head to their site now for 20% off on orders $2,999 and below, and get 25% off orders $3,000 and over.

Interior Define Gaby Leather Chaise Sectional

Interior Define Glenn Floor Lamp

Cozy Earth

Bedding and loungewear: They are the finishing touch for any carefully curated room. Now’s your chance to try the bedding brand that both Oprah and commerce editor Audrey Lee gave their stamp of approval to. Save up to 25% during the brand’s Memorial Day sale. We recommend stocking up on the cool-to-the-touch bamboo sheet sets.

Cozy Earth Coronado Lounge Chair

Cozy Earth Linen Bamboo Sheet Set

SSENSE

SSENSE doesn’t carry your average home essentials. The pieces from this retailer are far more luxe and unlike anything you’ll find anywhere else—like this mug that looks more like a modern art piece. For the holiday weekend, the site is offering up to 50% off sale items. This is a much-anticipated seasonal sale, so don’t sleep on it.

Maki Rugs Entirety Rug

Henry Holland Studio Check Loop Mug

Saatchi Art

Finding ways to fill up wall space can be surprisingly difficult—and it’s easy to opt for something you less than love, like an ubiquitous Matisse print. Saatchi Art makes finding work you connect with a bit easier, thanks to a massive curated selection. Head to Saatchi for 15% off all original art OVER $500 with code SUNBEAM15, and 20% off original art over $3,000 with code SUNBEAM20 through 5/29.

"Interior with Red Chair" by Patty Rodgers

"Jungle Part" by Szabo Eszter

Saatva

If you’re already purchasing some new sheets, then you might as well snag a new mattress to put your sheets on. Luckily Saatva, one of our favorite mattresses, is hosting a limited-time sale ahead of Memorial Day. We’d recommend taking advantage of the pre–Memorial Day deals to get the brand’s Loom & Leaf memory foam mattress, which contributor Bailey Berg called the “most breathable, comfortable mattress” she’s ever tried. And be sure to check out our roundup of the best Memorial Day mattress sales happening right now!

Saatva Loom & Leaf Mattress

Saatva Santorini Bed Frame

The Company Store

There are a lot of things you could stock up on during The Company Store’s summer sale, but we recommend looking into the indoor/outdoor pillow situation. Regardless, you can get 30% off sitewide across all categories—no code needed.

Sunbrella Indoor/Outdoor Toss Pillow

Jersey Knit Comforter Set

Buffy

We’ve reviewed (and loved) many products from Buffy—the Breeze sheet set, the linen sheet set, the Cloud pillow, Breeze comforter, linen quilt, and so much more. Lucky for all of us, the brand’s offering 20% off sitewide during their early Memorial Day sale promo.

Buffy Eucalyptus Sheet Set

Buffy Cloud Comforter

Albany Park

Anyone looking to end their years-long search for a couch should take a peek at what AD-reviewed brand Albany Park is offering: up to 45% off select seating. In a world where buying a couch can be wildly overwhelming, the brand makes it easy with a few versatile choices. Our contributor Terri Williams knows that better than anyone—she told us her Park sectional has “clean lines, sleek edges, and soft covers [that] would look good in almost any type of home.”

Albany Park Park Sectional Sofa

Albany Park Barton Sofa

DWR

Design Within Reach aims to make luxurious designer furniture pieces from past and present just a little more accessible for online shoppers. In stock items are 30% off, like this curvaceous chair from Sarah Ellison and a Knoll cart we recently included in our roundup of the best outdoor bar carts. And you’ll save even more this Memorial Day thanks to an additional 20% off already-on-sale items with code EXTRA20.

Sarah Ellison Chromeo Chair

Knoll 1966 Porcelain Serving Cart by Richard Schultz

West Elm

A go-to retailer for elevated furniture-and-decor basics, West Elm is having a massive Fourth of July Warehouse Sale. Take up to 60% off furniture and decor, including lovely outdoor couches marked down right as outdoor hosting season is ramping up and these discounted throw pillows that will really dress up your indoor seating or currently drab bedscape.

West Elm Portside Outdoor Sofa

West Elm Mariposa Pillow Cover

Sundays

Sundays sells furniture pieces big and small for all areas of your home, and the brand is currently running up to 30% off everything. Contributor Shoko Wagner personally experienced one of the retailer’s best sellers when she reviewed the Wind Down sectional. “Designed with clean lines, deep cushions, and just-right balance of softness and structure, it never appears slouchy or sloppy (even with a three-year-old who has taken to practicing high dives and somersaults on it),” she says.

Sundays Wind Down 3-Piece Modular Sectional

Sundays Cloud Bed with Storage

Parachute

For Memorial Day weekend, Parachute’s promotions include 30% off everything and up to 75% off its sale items—meaning you could spend all summer wrapped up in gloriously soft bedding and loungewear. Plus, the sale’s also an excellent time to get ahead of schedule with your Father’s Day gifting strategy.

Parachute Waffle Robe

Parachute Linen Bedding Bundle

Rejuvenation

Check out Rejuvenation for discounts on classic, American-leaning outdoor furniture designs. During the brand's Memorial Day promotions you can save up to 60% off and enjoy free shipping with code FREESHIP. We recommend using the opportunity to focus on versatile furniture that can fit any room. After all, this comfy-looking lounge chair looks like the perfect piece to finally fill the empty space in your home office or replace the uncomfortable love seat in your living room.

Rejuvenation Parkrose Chair

Rejuvenation Rullis Bench

Nordstrom

Here’s an insider tip: Some of our favorite home brands happen to be stocked at Nordstrom. Think: Riedel wine glasses, cookware from Le Creuset, designer candles, Parachute bedding, Casper pillows, and so much more. This means, that during the brand’s big Half Yearly Sale you can grab rare deals on items that don’t usually get discounted—like this XL Le Creuset dutch oven. Though, we also think this fashionable wool and cashmere blanket is a steal at more than 60% off.

Nordstrom Plaid Wool & Cashmere Throw Blanket

Le Creuset Signature Oval Enamel Cast Iron French/Dutch Oven

Zinus

Zinus, who makes some of our favorite bed frames, is offering up discounts ahead of Memorial Day too. We’d use this as an opportunity to snag the Original Green Tea mattress, which is currently 20% off.

Zinus Cooling Green Tea Gel Memory Foam Mattress

Zinus Luca Reversible Chaise Sectional Sofa

Casper

Our team has tried (and loved) a lot of Casper mattresses. In fact, we dedicated a whole story just to some of our favorites. One was the Nova mattress, which contributor Nora Taylor found offered the ideal balance of plushness and support. Though Casper doesn’t sell the Nova anymore, you can get the very similar Dream Max Hybrid mattress for 30% off as part of the brand’s Memorial Day deals.

Casper Dream Max Hybrid Mattress

Casper Haven Bed Frame

JoyBird

Joybird has also extended its Memorial Day sale through June 2. This week, shoppers can still enjoy 35% off sitewide, best-selling items at up to 45% off, and select bundles up to 50% off. We have our sights set on items that will give your living room a face lift. The brand’s best-selling Lewis sofa or the Amelia Grand chair in an eye-catching teal or burnt orange will do just that.

Joybird Lewis Sofa

Joybird Amelia Grand Chair

Mcgee & Co.

Hurry! McGee & Co.’s sale ends tonight, May 27, and we think it’s the perfect opportunity to refresh your bedroom’s decor and furniture. Customers can enjoy up to 30% off sitewide as well as an additional 30% off already on sale items—meaning it’s worth looking through the clearance section for optimal deals. The brand’s floral block quilt is the perfect bedding to replace your winter-weight comforter ahead of summer. And if you’re looking to build out a more dynamic bedroom furniture layout, the Mansfield bench is just the piece to bring both function and style to the foot of your bed.

McGee & Co. Floral Block Print Quilt

McGee & Co. Mansfield Bench

Soho Home

Here’s something special: Soho Home is offering rare, 30% off discounts on select furniture and decor, meaning if you’ve had something from the brand on your wishlist, this might be your chance to snag a bargain. We’re particularly drawn to seats and lighting from the brand, so naturally we’d start there. The brand’s Abel armchair is the perfect place to spend all future lazy days, and the Casper table lamp is the ideal entryway piece to greet friends and visitors.

Soho Home Abel Armchair

Soho Home Casper Table Lamp

Sixpenny

Right now you can save 20% off Sixpenny purchase of $1,000 and up with code DANCINGLIGHT. After all, we know you’ve had your eye on some seating from Sixpenny ever since senior digital design editor Zoë Sessums called their Neva sectional, “One of the most comfy couches I’ve spent time on in a while.”

Sixpenny Gabriel Sofa

Sixpenny Gio Chair

Amazon

Amazon’s furniture and decor collections cover just about all the bases—from sectional sofas to statement lighting, rugs of all shapes and sizes, and modern bedframes to finally replace the one you’ve been using since college. The Naturalista frame from Mellow is an upgrade that will go with just about anything, you can even dress it up with a headboard of your choosing. For something with a slightly coastal touch, we like this rattan dresser that will finally motivate you to fold your clothes instead of tossing everything onto that one chair.

FUQARHY Rattan Dresser

Mellow Naturalista Classic Platform Bed

Lunya

If some fresh silk Pjs ahead of summer sound like a smart idea you’ll want to check out Lunya’s ongoing sale, which includes 70% off select items. “Even after washing [my] set many times over the years (cold water and mild detergent only!), they’ve held up wonderfully,” says commerce editor Audrey Lee. For the gals, we’d grab this printed set from the Grace Dines collab while you still can, while we think any guy would love the brand’s Slumberknit sweat pants (since we know you’re in desperate need of a new pair after a long winter.)
